name: Dawn - Flight and Apples
description:
This game is a small project. I'm going back to studying game development, and some animation techniques. I also bring the news that I'm starting to develop games for Android, since not all watchers and followers have access to Windows!

The game is about Dawn, a character of mine that I intend to develop in the future. Dawn is a sweet and kind girl who has special powers like controlling the elements of nature and flying. I haven't done much about her yet, but I can tell you that she really likes having a big belly (she channels energy in her belly and can (and enjoys to) get huge).

In this game, she is just doing a little flight training. The game is very simple. It has a mechanic similar to Flappy Bird, but with some changes! As I'm studying some mechanics, I'll probably post more simple games soon!

The game was entirely developed and built by me! There's no virus!

Hope you like it, guys! 😁

Thank you for playing! Feel free to post comments and report any bugs!
Support us on Patreon for help us to keep creating bloated belly content 😎: (www.patreon.com/encyclicalapex)
